name: BestFTSO
general: BestFTSO has been around since the very first epoch on the Songbird Network. BestFTSO provided the first NFT Marketplace on Songbird and provides additional NFTP claimable weekly.
infrastructure: We monitor prices from dozens of exchanges and run a machine learning algorithm to determine the most accurate price for each asset.
safeguards: Our algo uses machine learning, so it's always learning.
availability: Since epoch #1 on the Songbird Network!
selling: Does converting from SGB to FLR count as selling? Just enough to cover costs!
tooling: You can delegate directly on our website! https://bestftso.xyz/
